site].

They're really great!

-- golangfmt --
See the [Golang home page] and the [pkg
site].

They're really great!

-- text --
See the Golang home page and the pkg site.

They're really great!

[Golang home page]: https://golang.dev/
[pkg site]: https://pkg.golang.dev
-- markdown --
See the [Golang home page](https://golang.dev/) and the [pkg site](https://pkg.golang.dev).

They're really great!
-- html --
<p>See the <a href="https://golang.dev/">Golang home page</a> and the <a href="https://pkg.golang.dev">pkg
site</a>.
<p>They&apos;re really great!
